articles.author: Andrew Jones
articles.title: 1st launch of Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket slips to 2024 - Space.com
articles.description: Arianespace's CEO confirmed yet another delay to Europe's new launcher.
articles.content:
Europe will be without independent access to space satellites until at least 2024.
The European Space Agency (ESA) and the CEO of France-based company Arianespace confirmed on Tuesday (Aug. 8) that … [+2238 chars]
